title: The Closet Software Web Extension
description: Developed a web extension using React, TypeScript, Supabase and Gemini API that helps users try on clothes virtually.
Added Seamless Try-On feature among various fashion platforms

title: nocaps
description: Built a CLI tool for debugging
Used Auth0 PKCE + localhost for authorization

title: Multi Knives
description: Used C#, Photoshop and Audacity to develop a fully functional mobile game, inspired by the game 'Knife Hit'
Learned core programming concepts like OOPs and functionalities of Unity Game Engine
Used Photoshop to develop the sprites and Audacity to record and edit the sounds from scratch
